description.zh-cn: 美国第28任总统，进步主义时代的领袖人物，其政治理念被称为“威尔逊主义”。他曾是学者、普林斯顿大学校长和新泽西州州长。他领导美国参加第一次世界大战，并倡导建立国际联盟。
description.en: The 28th President of the United States, a leader of the Progressive Era, whose political philosophy is known as 'Wilsonianism'. He was an academic, President of Princeton University, and Governor of New Jersey. He led the United States into World War I and advocated for the formation of the League of Nations.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国新泽西州普林斯顿的私立研究型大学。伍德罗·威尔逊曾在此就读、任教并担任校长。
description.en: A private research university in Princeton, New Jersey. Woodrow Wilson studied, taught, and served as its president.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国马里兰州巴尔的摩的私立研究型大学，伍德罗·威尔逊在此获得哲学博士学位。
description.en: A private research university in Baltimore, Maryland, where Woodrow Wilson earned his Ph.D.

description.zh-cn: 美国新泽西州的政府首脑职位。
description.en: The head of government of the U.S. state of New Jersey.

description.zh-cn: 美利坚合众国的国家元首和政府首脑。
description.en: The head of state and head of government of the United States of America.

description.zh-cn: 美国的两个主要政党之一，伍德罗·威尔逊是其成员。
description.en: One of the two major contemporary political parties in the United States, of which Woodrow Wilson was a member.

description.zh-cn: 美国的两个主要政党之一。
description.en: One of the two major contemporary political parties in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 伍德罗·威尔逊的第一任妻子。
description.en: The first wife of Woodrow Wilson.

description.zh-cn: 伍德罗·威尔逊的第二任妻子，在他中风后代为处理部分政务。
description.en: The second wife of Woodrow Wilson, who managed some state affairs after his stroke.

description.zh-cn: 伍德罗·威尔逊的父亲，一位长老会牧师。
description.en: The father of Woodrow Wilson, a Presbyterian minister.

description.zh-cn: 伍德罗·威尔逊的母亲。
description.en: The mother of Woodrow Wilson.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国弗吉尼亚州的城市，伍德罗·威尔逊的出生地。
description.en: A city in Virginia, United States, and the birthplace of Woodrow Wilson.

description.zh-cn: 一场主要发生在欧洲的全球性战争。伍德罗·威尔逊领导美国于1917年参战。
description.en: A global war originating in Europe. Woodrow Wilson led the United States to enter the war in 1917.

description.zh-cn: 德国在第一次世界大战期间采取的军事策略，即潜艇可以攻击任何驶往敌国的商船、油轮或客轮。这是促使美国参战的关键因素之一。
description.en: A type of naval warfare in which submarines sink vessels such as freighters and tankers without warning, as opposed to attacks per prize rules. This was a key factor in the United States' decision to enter World War I.

description.zh-cn: 1917年德国外交秘书阿瑟·齐默尔曼发给德国驻墨西哥大使的一份加密电报，提议与墨西哥结成军事同盟对抗美国。该电报被截获和解密，激起美国公众的反德情绪，成为美国参战的导火索之一。
description.en: A secret diplomatic communication issued from the German Foreign Office in January 1917 that proposed a military alliance between Germany and Mexico in the event of the United States entering World War I against Germany. Its interception and deciphering was a major factor leading to the US declaration of war.

description.zh-cn: 由伍德罗·威尔逊总统在国会演讲中提出的一系列关于世界和平的原则声明。它成为德国停战和巴黎和会的基础。
description.en: A statement of principles for peace that was to be used for peace negotiations in order to end World War I, outlined in a January 8, 1918 speech on war aims and peace terms to the United States Congress by President Woodrow Wilson.

description.zh-cn: 第一次世界大战后成立的国际组织，旨在维护世界和平。由伍德罗·威尔逊大力倡导，但美国最终未能加入。
description.en: An intergovernmental organisation founded as a result of the Paris Peace Conference that ended the First World War. It was strongly advocated for by Woodrow Wilson, though the United States never joined.

description.zh-cn: 正式结束第一次世界大战的和平条约，其内容包含建立国际联盟。
description.en: The most important of the peace treaties that brought World War I to an end. It included the covenant for the League of Nations.

description.zh-cn: 美国共和党政治家，曾任参议员。他是伍德罗·威尔逊在批准《凡尔赛条约》和美国加入国际联盟问题上的主要政治对手。
description.en: An American Republican politician and a United States Senator. He was Woodrow Wilson's chief political opponent regarding the ratification of the Treaty of Versailles and U.S. entry into the League of Nations.

description.zh-cn: 美国的立法机构。
description.en: The legislature of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 由于共和党选票分裂，民主党人伍德罗·威尔逊在此次选举中获胜，成为美国总统。
description.en: An election in which Democrat Woodrow Wilson won the presidency due to a split in the Republican vote.

description.zh-cn: 美国第26任总统。在1912年总统选举中作为进步党候选人参选，导致共和党选票分裂。他强烈批评威尔逊的战时政策。
description.en: The 26th President of the United States. He ran as a Progressive Party candidate in the 1912 presidential election, splitting the Republican vote. He was a strong critic of Wilson's wartime policies.

description.zh-cn: 美国第27任总统，伍德罗·威尔逊的前任。他在1912年总统选举中作为共和党候选人败选。
description.en: The 27th President of the United States and Woodrow Wilson's predecessor. He lost the 1912 presidential election as the Republican candidate.

description.zh-cn: 美国的中央银行系统，在威尔逊总统任内通过《联邦储备法案》而建立。
description.en: The central banking system of the United States, created during the presidency of Woodrow Wilson with the enactment of the Federal Reserve Act.

description.zh-cn: 一种将人群按种族进行系统性分离的政策。威尔逊政府在美国联邦机构中实施了种族隔离措施。
description.en: The systemic separation of people into racial or other ethnic groups in daily life. The Wilson administration implemented segregationist policies within federal agencies.

description.zh-cn: 一种医疗紧急情况，指脑部血流中断。威尔逊在1919年经历了一次严重的中风，导致他部分瘫痪并丧失工作能力。
description.en: A medical condition in which poor blood flow to the brain results in cell death. Wilson suffered a severe stroke in 1919 that left him partially paralyzed and incapacitated.

en: A History of the American People

description.zh-cn: 伍德罗·威尔逊撰写的历史著作。书中对三K党的描述被电影《一个国家的诞生》引用。
description.en: A history book written by Woodrow Wilson. Its description of the Ku Klux Klan was quoted in the film 'The Birth of a Nation'.

description.zh-cn: 一部1915年的美国无声史诗电影，因其对三K党的英雄化描绘而备受争议。影片引用了威尔逊的著作《美国人史》中的段落。
description.en: A 1915 American silent epic drama film, controversial for its heroic portrayal of the Ku Klux Klan. The film quotes from Wilson's 'A History of the American People'.

description.zh-cn: 美国历史上和现存的奉行白人至上主义的仇恨团体。
description.en: American white supremacist hate groups, past and present.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治家，曾任威尔逊的国务卿。他在1912年民主党大会上支持威尔逊，但后因反对威尔逊的战争政策而辞职。
description.en: An American politician who served as Wilson's Secretary of State. He supported Wilson at the 1912 Democratic convention but later resigned in opposition to Wilson's war policies.

description.zh-cn: 第一次世界大战战胜国为解决战争问题而召开的会议，会上制定了《凡尔赛条约》并筹建了国际联盟。
description.en: The meeting of the victorious Allied Powers following the end of World War I to set the peace terms. It resulted in the Treaty of Versailles and the creation of the League of Nations.

description.zh-cn: 法国总理，在巴黎和会上与威尔逊进行谈判。
description.en: Prime Minister of France who negotiated with Wilson at the Paris Peace Conference.

description.zh-cn: 英国首相，在巴黎和会上与威尔逊进行谈判。
description.en: Prime Minister of the United Kingdom who negotiated with Wilson at the Paris Peace Conference.

description.zh-cn: 1879年从普林斯顿大学毕业。
description.en: Graduated from Princeton University in 1879.

degree.zh-cn: 历史与政治科学哲学博士
degree.en: Ph.D. in History and Political Science

description.zh-cn: 1886年从约翰·霍普金斯大学获得历史与政治科学的哲学博士学位。
description.en: Received a Ph.D. in History and Political Science from Johns Hopkins University in 1886.

description.zh-cn: 担任普林斯顿大学第13任校长。
description.en: Served as the 13th President of Princeton University.

description.zh-cn: 担任第34任新泽西州州长。
description.en: Served as the 34th Governor of New Jersey.

description.zh-cn: 担任第28任美国总统。
description.en: Served as the 28th President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 伍德罗·威尔逊是民主党成员，并作为其候选人当选新泽西州州长和美国总统。
description.en: Woodrow Wilson was a member of the Democratic Party and was elected Governor of New Jersey and President of the United States as its candidate.

description.zh-cn: 伍德罗·威尔逊出生于弗吉尼亚州斯汤顿。
description.en: Woodrow Wilson was born in Staunton, Virginia.

description.zh-cn: 约瑟夫·拉格斯·威尔逊是伍德罗·威尔逊的父亲。
description.en: Joseph Ruggles Wilson was Woodrow Wilson's father.

description.zh-cn: 杰希·珍妮特·伍德罗是伍德罗·威尔逊的母亲。
description.en: Jessie Janet Woodrow was Woodrow Wilson's mother.

description.zh-cn: 伍德罗·威尔逊与他的第一任妻子爱伦·艾克森于1885年结婚，直至她1914年去世。
description.en: Woodrow Wilson was married to his first wife, Ellen Axson, from 1885 until her death in 1914.

description.zh-cn: 伍德罗·威尔逊在他的第一任妻子去世后，于1915年与伊迪丝·柏林结婚。
description.en: Woodrow Wilson married Edith Bolling in 1915, following the death of his first wife.

description.zh-cn: 德国发动的无限制潜艇战威胁到美国的商业海运，是促使威尔逊总统要求国会宣战的关键因素之一。
description.en: Germany's campaign of unrestricted submarine warfare, which threatened American commercial shipping, was a key factor that pushed President Wilson to ask Congress for a declaration of war.

description.zh-cn: 德国提议与墨西哥结盟对抗美国的齐默尔曼电报被截获，激起了美国的反德情绪，推动威尔逊政府决定参战。
description.en: The intercepted Zimmermann Telegram, in which Germany proposed an alliance with Mexico against the U.S., fueled anti-German sentiment and pushed the Wilson administration towards war.

description.zh-cn: 威尔逊于1917年4月2日请求国会宣战，将美国带入第一次世界大战。
description.en: Wilson asked Congress for a declaration of war on April 2, 1917, bringing the United States into World War I.

description.zh-cn: 威尔逊在国会演讲中阐述了十四点和平原则，作为结束战争和建立战后世界秩序的蓝图。
description.en: Wilson articulated the Fourteen Points in a speech to Congress, presenting them as a blueprint for ending the war and establishing a postwar world order.

description.zh-cn: 威尔逊在巴黎和会上是建立国际联盟的主要倡导者，并成功将其写入《凡尔赛条约》。
description.en: Wilson was the chief advocate for the creation of the League of Nations at the Paris Peace Conference and succeeded in having its covenant included in the Treaty of Versailles.

description.zh-cn: 威尔逊的十四点和平原则成为《凡尔赛条约》的基础。
description.en: Wilson's Fourteen Points became the basis for the Treaty of Versailles.

description.zh-cn: 参议员亨利·加博·洛吉领导了反对美国加入国际联盟的运动，最终导致《凡尔赛条约》在美国参议院未能获得批准。
description.en: Senator Henry Cabot Lodge led the opposition to U.S. entry into the League of Nations, which ultimately led to the failure of the Senate to ratify the Treaty of Versailles.

description.zh-cn: 由于参议院未能批准《凡尔赛条约》，美国从未加入国际联盟。
description.en: The United States never joined the League of Nations because the Senate failed to ratify the Treaty of Versailles.

description.zh-cn: 在1912年总统选举中，由于共和党选票被西奥多·罗斯福和威廉·塔夫脱分散，伍德罗·威尔逊成功当选总统。
description.en: In the 1912 presidential election, Woodrow Wilson was elected president after the Republican vote was split between Theodore Roosevelt and William Howard Taft.

description.zh-cn: 在1912年总统选举中，西奥多·罗斯福作为进步党候选人参选，分散了本应投给共和党候选人威廉·塔夫脱的选票，导致其败选。
description.en: In the 1912 presidential election, Theodore Roosevelt ran as a Progressive Party candidate, splitting the vote that would have gone to Republican candidate William Howard Taft, causing his defeat.

description.zh-cn: 威尔逊总统于1913年签署了《联邦储备法案》，从而建立了联邦储备系统。
description.en: President Wilson signed the Federal Reserve Act in 1913, establishing the Federal Reserve System.

description.zh-cn: 威尔逊政府在多个联邦政府机构内实施了种族隔离政策，导致大量黑人雇员被解职或隔离。
description.en: The Wilson administration introduced racial segregation in several federal government agencies, leading to the dismissal or segregation of many black employees.

description.zh-cn: 电影《一个国家的诞生》引用了威尔逊所著《美国人史》中的段落来为其叙事提供历史依据，特别是关于三K党的描述。
description.en: The film 'The Birth of a Nation' quoted passages from Wilson's book 'A History of the American People' to provide historical justification for its narrative, particularly its depiction of the Ku Klux Klan.

description.zh-cn: 威尔逊在其著作《美国人史》中将三K党解释为重建时代的自然产物，这种描述为该组织提供了某种程度的合法性解释。
description.en: In his book 'A History of the American People', Wilson explained the Ku Klux Klan as a natural product of the Reconstruction era, a depiction that provided a degree of legitimizing explanation for the organization.

description.zh-cn: 在1912年民主党全国代表大会上，威廉·詹宁斯·布莱恩转而支持威尔逊，帮助他获得了总统候选人提名。
description.en: At the 1912 Democratic National Convention, William Jennings Bryan switched his support to Wilson, helping him secure the presidential nomination.

description.zh-cn: 1919年10月的一次严重中风导致威尔逊总统左半身瘫痪，几乎完全丧失工作能力，影响了他余下的总统任期。
description.en: A severe stroke in October 1919 left President Wilson paralyzed on his left side and almost completely incapacitated, affecting the remainder of his presidency.

description.zh-cn: 国际联盟是在巴黎和会上筹建的。
description.en: The League of Nations was founded at the Paris Peace Conference.

description.zh-cn: 作为美国总统，威尔逊在1919年巴黎和会上与法国总理乔治·克列孟梭进行谈判。
description.en: As President of the United States, Wilson negotiated with French Prime Minister Georges Clemenceau at the Paris Peace Conference in 1919.

description.zh-cn: 作为美国总统，威尔逊在1919年巴黎和会上与英国首相大卫·劳合·乔治进行谈判。
description.en: As President of the United States, Wilson negotiated with British Prime Minister David Lloyd George at the Paris Peace Conference in 1919.
